1. iPhone 4S下，遥控器界面，开始按钮有一部分未显示。

2. More -> 意见反馈，跳到发邮件界面，点击取消或完成，都已经返回到WM Assistant，而不是返回到邮件程序。这个是容易实现的，试用一下“我在这儿”这个应用，点击+号，选择邮件。



    MFMailComposeViewController *mailPicker = [[MFMailComposeViewController alloc] init];
    mailPicker.mailComposeDelegate = self;
    
    //设置主题
    [mailPicker setSubject: @"eMail主题"];
    //添加收件人
    NSArray *toRecipients = [NSArray arrayWithObject: @"app@dji-innovations.com"];
    [mailPicker setToRecipients: toRecipients];
    
    NSString *emailBody = @"<font color='red'>eMail</font> 正文";
    [mailPicker setMessageBody:emailBody isHTML:YES];
    
    UIViewController *theMailViewController = [[mailPicker viewControllers] lastObject];
    [self.navigationController pushViewController:theMailViewController animated:YES];
    
    //[self presentModalViewController: mailPicker animated:YES];
    
    [mailPicker release];
